definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
as the saying goes/as they say...

sentences.english: Like they say, barking dogs don't bite.
sentences.chinese: 常言说的好，会叫的狗不咬人。

sentences.english: The speech style of emic research and the question of ethnic consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 主位研究的言说方式和民族认同。

sentences.english: They exist in time wholly of themselves, with an unspeakable solemnity.
sentences.chinese: 他们在时间中自我存在，有着不可言说的庄严。

sentences.english: An indescribable sorrow filled his heart and he automatically turned his head round.
sentences.chinese: 心头怅仍到不可言说，只是无意识地把身子乱转。

sentences.english: Lacan Shit is the languaged Other.
Self-existence is one of the special features of modernistic art.
sentences.chinese: 自我言说其存在，是现代主义艺术的特质之一。

sentences.english: People often say that, compared with nature, man is insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 常言说，和自然界相比，人类十分渺小。

sentences.english: However, efforts are made to the calling that the vitality of language.
sentences.chinese: 然而，却努力于招唤语言言说的生机。

sentences.english: Therefore, the emergence of artistic signification is no longer unconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 由此，艺术意味的生成不再是一个不可言说的问题。

sentences.english: This hexagram applies this philosophical thought to revealing the principles.
sentences.chinese: 本卦就运用了这一哲学思想来言说事理。

sentences.english: In a sense, the statement of the contemporary historiography is a kind of pure political discourse.
sentences.chinese: 在某种意义上，当代史言说是一种纯粹的政治性话语。

sentences.english: It is obviously only a manner of speaking to limit the articulatory relation to the bones.
sentences.chinese: 将表达的关系限制于骨头，显然只是言说的方式之一。

sentences.english: There is conflict between female speech and male narration in Cao Yu s dramas.
sentences.chinese: 曹禺剧作中存在着女性言说与男性叙述的冲撞。

sentences.english: Despite the many difficulties that are difficult to describe, he Teether persevered.
sentences.chinese: 尽管有着太多难以言说的困难，他还是咬牙坚持下来。

sentences.english: We owe you more than we can say.
sentences.chinese: 我们欠你的远胜于我们能言说的。

sentences.english: We can tell and show our loved ones that we love them. Often and sincerely.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以常常真诚地向我们所爱之人言说表达爱意。

definition: (conventional letter ending) words cannot fully express what is in my heart (idiom)
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
to remain silent/to have nothing to say
lies/wild talk/to tell lies/to talk nonsense/fantasy (literature)
a secret/sth best not told to anyone/confidential information
